hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn ‘Abbas said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was never asked about someone who had done one thing before another, but he would gesture with both his hands to say: ‘There is no harm in that.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَدَّمَ نُسُكًا قَبْلَ نُسُكٍ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever performs one rite before another
